author: Philip Williams
title: Could this pandemic reset the way the entire world interacts with China? Some politicians think it's inevitable
description: The emergence of COVID-19 in Wuhan has emboldened politicians who want answers from Beijing about the origin of the virus and suspected coverups in the early weeks of the outbreak, writes Philip Williams.
content:
Posted 
April 17, 2020 15:03:21
As some Australian politicians have learned to their cost speaking out on China can be a career-limiting move, but the emergence of COVID-19 in Wuhan has emboldened politicians who want answers from Beijing about the origin o… [+2720 chars]
